answers.answer: I would call to get an expert's opinion..I know swelling is sometimes a symptom of preeclampsia
Go to the hospital... could be pre eclampsia.  Scary thing. Good luck though.
Don't stress out, but it is important to talk to a professional. None of us are doctors lol
Don't stress out, but it is important to talk to a professional. None of us are doctors lol
I'm 39+5 and I'm swollen almost constantly. My shoes don't even fit. Haha, its pretty normal relax and hydrate yourself.
I'm calling my Dr just to be safe

question: So im 35w 1d and for almost an hour now it feels like my feet and hands are swollen my hands are all tingly and they feel fat... it has me worried a lil bit but is all of this ok? Or should I call my Dr? Some info would be greatly appreciated to help me calm down right now :\ :(
title: worried
